Uses of Package
net.homeip.donaldm.httpdbase4j

Classes in net.homeip.donaldm.httpdbase4j used by net.homeip.donaldm.httpdbase4j
ArchiveHttpd
          Implementation of the abstract Httpd class for web content in a jar in the classpath or in an archive.
ArchiveRequest
          Encapsulates an HTTP request for a resource in an archive or inside a jar in the classpath.
CloneableHeaders
          Wrapper for com.sun.net.httpserver.Headers that implements the Clonable interface and a copy constructor
CombinedRequest
           Support for combining several style sheets or javascripts into one request.
DirItemInterface
          The Request classes returns sortable lists of classes implementing the DirItemInterface to implement directory listings.
DirItemInterface.SORTBY
          Used as a parameter to specify how the directory contents should be sorted
FileRequest
          Encapsulates an HTTP request for a resource in a local file system
Httpd
          An embeddable Java web server that supports HTTP, HTTPS, templated content and serving content from inside a jar or archive (Supported types: jar, zip, tar, tar.gz, tar.bz2).
Httpd.LogLevel
          Logger level.
Httpd.ThreadModel
          Thread model for the server.
HttpHandleable
          Interface with all the overidable methods that handlers provide.
HttpResponse
          Encapsulates sending HTTP responses and provides several static methods for sending common HTTP error and informational responses.
Postable
          An interface that must be implemented by classes processing POST requests.
Request
          Abstraction of an HTTP request
Request.HTTP_METHOD
          Enumeration of HTTP methods
RequestHandler
          An abstraction of a handler for HTTP requests.
SimpleSessionManager
           
StringTemplateHandler
          Provides a base handler class for templating based on the StringTemplate library (http://www.stringtemplate.org/) The Templates (which must have an extension of '.st') may be processed in three ways:
Templatable
          An interface that must be implemented by template populating class used by StringTemplateHandler.
